parameters.name: Facedisp
parameters.description: Face that the edge is on

title: IEdge.EdgeInFaceSense
description: Checks whether the edge and the loop lying on the specified face have the same direction (sense).

parameters.name: Facedisp
parameters.description: Face that the edge is on

returns: True for the same direction, false for the opposite direction
remarks:
If this edge does not belong to the specified face, then this method can cause unpredictable
results.
